Class Loader

    • com.radirius.mercury.resource.Loader

extends Object
    A utility for resource loading from different locations.
    Author:
    wessles, Jeviny, Kevin Glass

      • getLocationStack

        public static Stack<Location> getLocationStack()
        Returns:
        the location stack.

      • getResource

        public static URL getResource(String path)
        Loads a URL of a resource. If the resource is not found in the top location of the stack, then the next location will be checked until either the resource is found, or there are no more locations.
        Parameters:
        path - The path of the resource
        Returns:
        the URL of a resource

      • getResourceAsFile

        public static File getResourceAsFile(String path)
        Loads a File resource.
        Parameters:
        path - The path of the resource
        Returns:
        the File resource

      • getResourceAsStream

        public static InputStream getResourceAsStream(String path)
        Streams a resource from the url of getResource(String path).
        Parameters:
        path - The path of the resource
        Returns:
        the InputStream of a resource.

      • streamFromUrl

        public static InputStream streamFromUrl(URL url)
        Converts a URL into an InputStream.
        Parameters:
        url - The URL to convert
        Returns:
        the converted InputStream.
